name: Cerntain Disaster
description:
"TOP-DOWN Puzzle Metroidvania" for Metroidvania Month 12

It's the year 2121 and scientists at the new Super Large Hadron Collider (SLHC) at CERN, Geneva, Switzerland are attempting to create the newly theorized hexaquark. They are successful but they accidentally create a blackhole in the reactor that will destroy the world. It is your job to go into the reactor, and find your way to the black hole to destroy it before it destroys the world. 

NOTE: The Linux build has been tested. The Windows and Mac builds have not. Please let me know if there are issues with them.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - move, navigate menus

Z - Accept, interact

X - use staff, back, cancel

C - swap staff mode

Spacebar - Start, pause menu
